column5: Well the rain didn't stop, but it let up enough for Averie and I to head out in hopes of catching a few fish... I wanted carp and she wanted whatever she could get to bite... We fished for just over an hour... I managed one little carp and Averie got into some panfish and a few small bass... Beat's sittin around in the house all day.  Averie kept busy with these while I chummed and waited for a bite...   We got this guy right off the bat.... I've never seen them with sores like that on the side before...   My net girl! haha http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIuByFjAmBM  Averie workin' the big rod...   The kid got a couple small largies also...   This little fish was jumping all over and got her excited...   Had to head home and cook supper but it took the itch off for another week anyways...  Cheers, Ryan
Awesome !  How is she liking school?
Dude, your girl is super cute, great little fishin' partner.

Great report, pics and video Ryan Looking at the video and hearing Averie say "DAD GET'HIM" brought a big smile to my face.... I even was laughing out loud  Give my favorite fisher person a great big hug for me and tell her "GREAT JOB DUDE" and high fives Good job you two and thanks for sharing!!! Jacques
Ryan, LOVE the video!!  The tone in her voice...."Dad, get him"   LOL    Thanks for the sharing some of the joy in your life with us
Looks like Avery outfished you AGAIN Ryan!
Net girl is funny. I wish my 3 girls were as interested as your little one.  I haven't caught a carp in about 18 years or so.  Wow.  Not even one by accident.
Now that's Cute great report Richard
Awesome Ryan!.......like a few others said.............."dad Get him" comment = priceless!

Thanks guys - It's my pleasure to share our outings with you....   Misty - We have an integrated start for the kids in my area.  Last week she went and met her teacher, and got the grand tour, picked out her spot and so on.  This week she starts her first real full day of school on thursday!  Cheers, Ryan
Nice, Ryan!!  Better tell Dave to watch out, Averie will be hosting her own show soon!

I'll second Mike's remark...  How in hell did you manage the camera and catching carp all at once ???  Was at my kidney specialist's office this morning for results of some tests...  On the 19th of August he outfitted me with a 24 hour blood pressure monitor and seeing as how I was in P'boro I wandered over to Little Lake to wet a line...(when the monitor goes off...I was supposed to stay perfectly still)...At noon I hook up with a 18 to 20 pound carp and sure enough the monitor goes off...it pulled drag till I was close to being spooled but I managed to stay still and eventually net it...My reading for that particular moment was 190/???...very very high for me as I take meds to keep it in line...   He made a remark on the chart "20 pound carp"...LOL
I love reading your reports... your lil' one has the powers to make ANYONE smile!
She's a cutie. Definitely the star of the show. Thanks for sharing.
